docs.text: bruce willis is a type-casted actor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in die hard , he played john mcclaine , a rough and tough chicago cop who gets caught in the wrong place at the wrong time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: again , in pulp fiction , as butch coolidge , an over-the-hill boxer , he steps on the wrong guys toes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in luc besson's the fifth element , willis plays korben dallas , a new york cabby who takes in the wrong passenger at the worst possible time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a stylish science fiction epic , the fifth element's complex plot begins right away , in the deserts of egypt ( think stargate ) in 1914 .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: an enormous spacecraft lands above a pyramid where the " 5 elements " are stored and takes them away , vowing to return them when the evil comes back .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cut to present day , which is our future .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the year is 2023 , and new york is the city .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the only basic differences between besson's futuristic depiction and the real life new york is that the smog is thicker , the buildings are higher , and the traffic floats !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: anyway , the " evil " comes back as a ball of fire to wreak havoc on the fair citizens of the earth , so back come the tortoise-like aliens to return the " 5 elements " to earth , in order to defend themselves against the " evil . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the process , however , the ship is intercepted by 2 fighter pods and is destroyed before landing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when officials arrive at the site , all that remains is a hand .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what can you do with a hand ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hey , its the 21st century here-dna reconstruction !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this hand turns out to belong to a beautiful , but mysterious woman named leeloo ( milla jovovich , dazed and confused ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she escapes and , attempting to escape the police by swan diving off of an enormous skyscraper and crashing through the roof of korben's floating cab .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's love at first site , as korben and leeloo elude the lazy-as-always cops .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when leeloo begins mumbling about a cornelius ( ian holm , night falls on manhattan ) , korben searches the " yellow pages " and delivers her to the door of the good reverend , the only man who knows of her background and duties .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now , korben , leeloo , and cornelius must journey to a foreign planet to board a cruise ship ( special effects were spectacular here ) to find the remaining four elements .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is here , where they discover that they have been followed by the evil jean-baptiste emmanuel zorg ( gary oldman , murder in the first ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he , too , wants possession of the elements , as do a group of pig-like warriors ( think the gamorreans in return of the jedi ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in a spectacular ending , with time running out , leeloo is faced with a problem-why should she save a people who live to destroy each other ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the question is a good one , and one that could be pondered .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but enough of that .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when korben points out his love for her , leeloo is inclined to become the " 5th element " and save the world from total destruction .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the fifth element features good performances by willis and holm , an excellent portrayal of a comedic villain ( who reminded me a lot of jack nicholson's the joker in batman ) by one of the masters of villainy , oldman , and a heartfelt offering by relative newcomer jovovich .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the supporting cast , which includes brion james ( tango & cash ) , tim " tiny " lester ( no holds barred ) , luke perry ( buffy the vampire slayer ) , and chris tucker ( friday ) , added a comedic effect to the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although besson's the fifth element can be criticized for the outlandish use of cliches , it is a solid motion picture with a definite point .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some other directors ( like anaconda's luis llosa ) should take a lesson from this guy-using ideas from epic motion pictures the right way .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ideas from star wars and stargate were utilized for the improvement of this film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sci-fi fan or not , any movie-lover should see this wonderfully stylish motion picture .
docs.label: positive
